name: VIDEO: County Completes Phase Two of Probation’s Youth Transition Campus
description: County leaders were joined by community partners to celebrate the completion of phase two of the new Youth Transition Campus in Kearny Mesa.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Reading Time:  < 1 minuteCounty leaders were joined by community partners to celebrate the completion of phase two of the new Youth Transition Campus in Kearny Mesa.  Phase one was completed in 2022. This new phase includes additional living units, a standalone school, a basketball courts, a sports field and a large family visitation area. The Youth Transition Campus has been designed to support a model of positive youth development with input from national juvenile justice experts.
